import React from 'react' import { Card, CardMedia, CardContent, Typography, IconButton } from '@material-ui/core'; import { AddShoppingCart } from '@material-ui/icons'; import useStyles from './styles' const Product = ({ product }) => { const classes = useStyles(); return (
<>
{product.name}
{product.price} {product.description}
) } export default Product
